bibl.title: New Evidence on Byzantine Aristocrats in Fiscal Contexts from the 5th-6th Centuries.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: P. Heid. Inv. G 1671[a] = P. Gascou 22a. A 5th-century protocol. Provenance unknown, 5th c. - Inv. G 1671[b] = P. Gascou 22b. An order of delivery from the μερίς of the clarissimus Eudaemon. Provenance unknown, 5th c. - Inv. G 235a = P. Gascou 23. A receipt for διαγραφή for the heirs of the ἐνδοξότατοι Dioscorus and Theodorus. Antinoopolis, 6th c. (?). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Heid. Inv. G 235a = P. Gascou 23; 1671[a] = P. Gascou 22a; 1671[b] = P. Gascou 22b
Lajos Berkes, New Evidence on Byzantine Aristocrats in Fiscal Contexts from the 5th-6th Centuries.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 65-70, 3 figg.; - 656.

P. Heid. Inv. G 1671[a] = P. Gascou 22a. A 5th-century protocol. Provenance unknown, 5th c. - Inv. G 1671[b] = P. Gascou 22b. An order of delivery from the μερίς of the clarissimus Eudaemon. Provenance unknown, 5th c. - Inv. G 235a = P. Gascou 23. A receipt for διαγραφή for the heirs of the ἐνδοξότατοι Dioscorus and Theodorus. Antinoopolis, 6th c. (?). - Avec résumé en anglais.
